host.label: FTP Server Host
host.help: The FTP server host to connect to.

port.label: FTP Server Port
port.help: (Optional) The FTP server port to connect to. Default: 21

path.label: Path
path.help: (Optional) The absolute path of the folder/directory where to fetch files from. Default: /

recursive.label: Recursive
recursive.help: (Optional) Denotes if the path subfolder tree will be traversed. Default: false

deviceId.label: Device Identifier
deviceId.help: (Optional) The identifier for the device. If Folder Name, the folder name will be used as the Device ID. If File Name, the file name will be used as the Device ID. Default: Folder Name
